All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AlcoholicDrink
Class defining alcoholic drinks.
ButtonType
Enum for all possible button types in the application.
Controller
Class defining the Controller of the application
CustomPizzaFrame
 
Drink
Base class defining the properties of a generic drink item.
Food
Base class defining the behavior of a generic food item.
IMenuItem
Interface defining the behavior of a generic menu item.
LPanel
Contains a list of items on the menu, the order history and the buttons on the left side of the main panel.
Main
 
MainFrame
Is the main window of the application with a title and a border.
MainPanel
MainPanel is the main container, containing instances of LPanel and RPanel.
MenuItem
Base class defining the properties and implementing the behavior of a generic menu item.
Order
Class defining a customer's order.
OrderItem
Class defining order items.
Pizza
Class defining pizzas.
RPanel
Contains a list of ordered items and the buttons on the right side of the main panel.
SoftDrink
Class defining soft (non-alcoholic) drinks.
Topping
Enum for all available Pizza toppings.
